There are some: There are some things that still have to be done the old-fashioned way, and transcription is one of those.
We can use: We can use new technologies to streamline the process, but to do it the most accurately, it's all about the human ear and eye. That's why you need us, to automate the process for you. We'll help move your project on ... from audio to the page. Whether it's an academic report, a magazine article, a reality TV show, or a focus group, we'll use human expertise to identify speakers through overlapping voices, understand accents, and format to your specifications.
